summary: Adds a book container on the table near farengar in dragonsreach containing different enchanted and non enchanted floating spellbooks..
descriptionHtml:
Adds a book container on the table near farengar in dragonsreach containing different enchanted and non enchanted floating spellbooks.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mod Recommendations

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28642/?]Ultimate HD Fire Effects by [b]BuzzDee84[/b][/url]
Make the fireballs look a bit better.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40190/?]Immersive Sounds - Magicby [b]lazygecko[/b][/url]
Much better sounding spells to go with it.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9894/?]Enchantment Cleanser by [b]SirReality
[/b][/url]To remake the enchantments you did to the books.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58418/?]Pretty Staff And Magic Cast Animations by Dualsun and all required[/url]
For third person staff animation changes.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64597/?]Staff Mod - Overhaulish by funkydiscogod
[/url]Gain exp while firing things off from your book and such.

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17623/?]Unlimited Weapon Charges by [b]SwampRock[/b][/url]
[/b]So you can cast from the books asmuch as you please without worrying about recharge, any unlimited charge mod will do.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48035/?]College of Winterhold Staff Enchanter and Merchant by [b]ConnorTaylor97
[/b][/url]So Its a little easier for you dragonborn dlcs to enchant the bookstaffs.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73372/?]Invisible Lydia by me! ;)[/url]
Now you can give your invisible lydia one of my staff spellbooks she seems to equip it on first combat so there you go flying book pet FTW!.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.4
Fixed the Enhanced camera bug when you have that mod, Sadly with that optional file the book only shows 1st person.
Books now equip to your ring slot so you can equip other things to the left/
Added another optional called "Inscriptions Addon" Which will give you some spells for your book, equip them to left.
You can find the inscriptions in the "Inscription Reading For Dum Dums" Near Farengars Books.
I made the spellbooks equip to ring slot so you could use the inscription spell on the left hand.

Version 1.3
Added staff type books that now look like there casting it first person!
I recommend getting a staff animation replacer aswell.
Fire, Ice, And  Lightning.
Enjoy the update! :D

[youtube]ZGkmIRjv38A[/youtube]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Incompatibility's:
1st person mods that show 3rd person body, will show 2 books.
Equipping the staff version to your right hand looks funny.
Torches, Yeah.
author: thelawfull

files.name: Thelawfulls Floating Spellbook Enhanced Camera Version
files.fileName: Thelawfulls Floating Spellbook Enhanced Camera Version-72859-1-0.zip
